lead_paragraph: The gunmen were believed to have fired their weapons at members of a rival gang and were not targeting police officers, as some news outlets initially reported, a union spokesman said.

headline.main: Shots Fired Near Marseille on Day of French Prime Minister’s Visit
headline.print_headline: Shots Fired Near Marseille on Day of French Prime Minister’s Visit

snippet: The gunmen were believed to have fired their weapons at members of a rival gang and were not targeting police officers, as some news outlets initially reported, a union spokesman said.
